official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to increase the authorization of appropriation for the Land and Water Conservation Fund.

summary.text: Increases, under the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965, the authorization of appropriations for the Land and Water Conservation Fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to increase the authorization of appropriation for the Land and Water Conservation Fund.
